channel.title: [PI]- Just a few problems. *CLOSED*
channel.description: Okay could someone either show me, teach me, or spoon-feed me on how to: [s]1. Add Writing Text to Achievements tab.[/s] (And if you could, how to add new quests) 2. Add a new server rank(Complete) For example: "Veteran" 3. How to work Toms Cache Editor so that way I can learn how to create my own Ints for my newest Models? Example: "Energy Sword" If you think you can help with any of these, please post below, or Private message me. Thanks to all that help.

item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:15, topic:458856”]I am talking about the crown part of this thread. For the quest tab, look for RSInterface.java and search for one of the lines on the quest tab. In that void, you just need to edit things accordingly. There might be some strings sent server sided through frame 126 aswell.[/quote]If you read at the beginning, I crossed out adding text to Achievement Diary, I found a pretty basic guide, used the Text Line ID, and searched it in my Client Folders, and went from there. Now, I need to add a clicking interface to each of them in the Achievement Diary and then make them open up quests n stuff. I am searching for guides now, but there all for Quest Tabs… I need one for achievement diary since I do not know how to make what they say and transfer it to Achievement Diary…then I got over 12 quests to think of and create. :D.
Mind helping with any of this?

Read full topic

item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:9, topic:458856”]Yea. That basically tells you how to do it. You may have to use your noggin a little bit, but I’m sure you can manage.

Here I’ll start you off. Basically read through it really fast, find what its telling you to change. Don’t change it, do just add the same thing again right under what you’re suppose to change and BOOM you have a new crown.[/quote]Read my last post its edited
I don’t just need a new crown, that’s not the problem. In player files I would like the rank “Veteran” added <-- I need to learn how to add stuff like that again. Then, I need one code that I would use in commands.java and client.java that will let Vets have certain rights above normal players.
